definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: ad fin.), [[שְׁבוּרֵי לֵב]] Ps 147:3; [[וׇאֶשְׁבּׂר עָלָיו חֻקִּי]] Job 38:10 broke for it my boundary, of sea, ref. to abrupt ending of mainland; = quench thirst (frangere sitim) Ps 104:11.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: :57 Pf. 3 ms. [[נִשְׁבַּר]] Ex 22:9 +, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשָּׁבֵר]] Le 6:21 +, 3 fs. [[וְתִשָּׁ֫בֶר]] Ec 12:6, 2 ms. [[תִּשָּׁבֵר]] Ez Eze 29:7, [[שַבר]]- Eze 32:28, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הִשָּׁבֵר]] Jon 1:4 Pt. [[נִשְׁבָּר]] Ps 51:19, fs. [[נִשְׁבָּרָה]] v:Ps 51:19, [[נִשְׁבֶּ֫רֵת]] Ez Eze 27:34 +, etc.;—be broken, of neck 1Sa 4:18, bones Ps 34:21, gate-bars Je 51:30, rod (in fig.) Is 14:21, Je 48:17, idols Ez Eze 6:4, Eze 6:6, horn Da 8:8, cf. v:Da 8:22, arm Job 31:22 ([[מִקָּנׇה]]), and (in metaph.) Je 48:25, Job 38:15, Ps 37:17, cf. Ez Eze 30:22, bough Ez Eze 31:12, Is 27:11, cf. (fig.) of wickedness, like a tree Job 24:20, other things Ps 37:15, Je 50:23, Ez Eze 29:7, Ps 124:7; cisterns Je 2:13 (id.), pottery Le 6:21, Le 15:12 (P), Ec 12:6 (in fig.); = be maimed, crippled (have limb broken), of animal Ex 22:9, Ex 22:13 (E), and (fig.) Ez Eze 34:4, Eze 34:16, Zec 11:16, so (fig. of men stumbling) Is 8:15, Is 28:13; be wrecked, of ships 1Ki 22:49 (rd. Qr [[נִשְׁבְּרוּ]]), ‖ 2Ch 20:37, Jon 1:4, metaph. of Tyre Ez Eze 27:34; fig. be crushed, destroyed (pers., warriors, kingdoms, etc.), Je 14:17, Je 22:20, Je 48:4, Je 51:8 + 10 t.; fig. be broken, of heart † Je 23:9, Is 61:1, Ps 34:19, Ps 51:19, cf. ´[[רוּחַ נִשׁ]]: v:Ps 51:19.—Ex 6:9 rd. prob. [[וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּ֫י]] (We Sm Berthol Toy Krae); Co [[בְּשָׁבְרִי]].

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: :36 Pf. 3 ms. [[שִׁבַּר]] Is 21:9 +, [[שִׁבֵָּר]] Ex 9:25, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְשַׁבֵּר]] Ps 46:10 +, 2 mpl. [[תְּשַׁבֵּרָוּן]] Ex 34:13, etc.; Inf. abs. [[שַׁבֵּר]] Ex 23:24; Pt. [[מְשַׁבֵּר]] 1Ki 19:11;—shatter, break, tablets Ex 32:19 (E), Ex 34:1 (J), De 9:17, De 10:2; [[מַצֵּבוֹת]] Ex 23:24 (E; + Inf. abs.), Ex 34:13 (J) + 7 t.; images 2Ki 11:18 + 3 t.; bronze sea, etc., 2Ki 25:13 = Je 52:17; horns Da 8:7; jaws Job 29:17 (in fig.); of hail shattering tree Ex 9:25 (J), cf. 1Ki 19:11; elsewhere subj. ´[[י]]:, shattering gate-bars, etc., weapons Is 45:2, Is 38:13, La 2:9, La 3:4, Ps 46:10, Ps 76:4, Ps 107:16, trees Ps 29:5, Ps 105:33, heads of [[תַּנִּינִים]] Ps 74:13; wrecking ship Ps 48:8. †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: cause to break out, i.e. bring to the birth, Impf. 1 s. [[הַאֲנִי אַשְׁבִּיר וְלאׁ אוֹלִיד]] Is 66:9 (´[[י]]: subj.; cf. [[מַשְׁבֵּר]] infr.). †

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: be broken, shattered (in heart), Pf. 1 s. [[עַל־שֶׁבֶר בַּת־עַמִּי הָשְׁבַָּרְתִּי]] Je 8:21.
